author: Andrew Ang J:
casename: Lian Hwee Choo Phebe and Another v Maxz Universal Development Group Pte Ltd and Others
counsel: Suresh Nair and Tan Chin Kwan Jonathan (Allen & Gledhill LLP) for the plaintiffs; Harpreet Singh Nehal SC, Meyer Bernette Colleen and Dawn Ho (Drew & Napier LLC) for the second and fourth defendants; Siraj Omar and See Chern Yang (Premier Law LLC) for the third defendant
tags-parsed: Companies/Memorandum and articles of association/Whether article providing for increase in share capital referred only to authorised share capital/Whether abolition of authorised share capital rendered said article otiose/Companies Act (Cap 50, 1994 Rev Ed) Fourth Schedule Table A Art 40(a)
